sentences.en: 'Dead as mutton,'returned the other,'and can't be too dead.
sentences.cn: “ 死得像羊肉一样, ” 对方回答, “ 死得不能再死了.

sentences.en: Can you do with cold mutton for lunch?
sentences.cn: 你能凑合着吃点冷羊肉当午饭 吗 ?

sentences.en: He consumed the best part of a leg of mutton.
sentences.cn: 他吃掉羊腿肉的最好部分.

sentences.en: He dines on a chicken or a scrap of mutton.
sentences.cn: 一只小鸡,或一小块羊肉,就算他一顿正餐了.

sentences.en: He likes to eat mutton which was seasoned with garlic.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢吃用大蒜调味的羊肉.

sentences.en: He lit a fire, spitted a leg of mutton.
sentences.cn: 他点燃了一堆火, 用炙叉叉住一条羊腿.
我来给你烤一些羊肉吃.

sentences.en: Let me give you a little mutton.

sentences.cn: 请把昨天的羊肉热一下.

sentences.en: Pork and mutton should be kept in cold storage.
She bought a leg of mutton.
They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.cn: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

sentences.en: This mutton has got a strong smell.
We had roast mutton for dinner.
We have a leg of mutton for dinner tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们今晚有只羊腿作晚餐.

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式， 贬)年轻打扮的老妇（或中年妇女）
红烧羊肉；糊羊肉；烩羊肉
